intro: From infiltration to urban defense! Eliminate the terrorist organization! Extreme FPS action with overwhelming combat! Face endless threats with diverse weapons!
description:
A first-person shooter where you fight against the threat of coordinated global terrorism as a member of Operation Shadow Lift, a multinational counterterrorism special forces unit. Track operatives hiding in blue container trucks at a quiet port facility at dawn, intercept mobile rockets launched from secret desert bases, and engage in urban warfare alongside heavy armored tanks in cities under states of emergency. Utilize highly strategic combat systems to stop the terrorist organization Feral's "Operation Wild Feral" and experience unprecedented, intense battlefield action.

・An authentic FPS action shooter unfolding from a thrilling first-person perspective.
・Challenge missions across diverse locations worldwide, including ports, desert bases, and urban areas.
・Experience varied combat situations with different time periods and environments, from nighttime infiltration operations to daytime urban suppression.
・Defense Mode unlocks after clearing Story Mode, allowing you to intercept endless waves of enemies.
・Rich weapon systems and tactical approaches can be utilized depending on the situation.
・Enjoy combat using various weapons including assault rifles, sniper rifles, shotguns, submachine guns, and rocket launchers.
・Experience thrilling story development as you thwart the international conspiracy of the terrorist organization Feral.
・In Defense Mode, engage in extreme survival battles, repelling increasingly powerful enemies each wave while holding your defensive line.
・In each mission, choose tactics from stealth to frontal assault based on your judgment.
・Smooth controls designed for enjoyment by both FPS beginners and veterans.
・Immersive combat scenes rendered with beautiful 3D graphics.

As an elite member of the counterterrorism special forces, face global crises, complete all missions, and restore peace. Even after clearing Story Mode, Defense Mode offers infinite combat challenges with abundant replayability as you aim for the highest score. Experience your tactics and shooting skills tested to witness the final ending!

Prologue
A quiet port facility at dawn.
As blue container trucks are unloaded one by one, operatives from the terrorist organization Feral have secretly infiltrated the area.
Hours later, mobile rockets are launched from a Middle Eastern desert base toward major cities around the world.
This marks the beginning of "Operation Wild Feral."
A state of emergency is declared and military forces from various nations deploy to urban areas.
Heavy armored tanks and elite units are positioned throughout city districts, preparing for combat against the terrorists.
You are deployed to this chaotic battlefield as a member of the multinational counterterrorism special forces unit, Operation Shadow Lift.
Fight against the savage terrorist organization Feral and restore world peace.
